page.title: 04Features of the Yaxham Area
page.content: {The Railway Station.} This is one of Yaxham's features will a touch of history and trade. Although trains still run,they are for freight only. The station is closed,but the platforms and the land around them are now used by "Yaxham Light Railways".It is a narrow gauge railway with about 100 metres of track. It has six engines, four tipper trucks and four flat trucks. This is a private concern, with the land owned by British Rail.Extra steam engines include a traction engine and steam roller.
